text: @TheRickWilson And NOW the realization of Coronavirus visits them it has no mercy buckle up buttercups. 77,000 deaths & many days of suffering fo those who recovered. Not to mention potential long term effects due to lung & heart damage. But maybe the inept occupant in WH can wave his hand/gone
